items.name: Rod of Testing
items.description: The Rod of Testing is given to every new program starting out its journey to becoming the best it can be.
items.rules: Can test as many times as the program desires.
items.paste_block:
Beric uses **Rod of Testing**.

*Description*:
The Rod of Testing is given to every new program starting out its journey to becoming the best it can be.

*Effect*:
Can test as many times as the program desires.
